resources.string:
①Sewn Through Construction keeps down insulation in place while lightening the weight
②Down-proofing helps keep down from escaping through the face fabric
③Micro-fleece lined collar provides an additional warmth around the neck
④Zip End Guard protects your chin and face
⑤Water Repellent Zipper helps keep water out
⑥Pocket Hem Adjuster allows for cinching the hem while helping keep out chill air
⑦Elastic cuffs prevent cold air from entering
⑧4 pockets (2 zippered fleece lined pockets, 2 internal drop-in pockets)
⑨Stuff sack included
